```{r}
test <- read.csv(file.choose())
str(test)
library(tidyverse)
head(test)

test %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = length, y = mass, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  theme_bw()
```
